price: Nítorí náà, ṣe àfọ̀mọ́ pẹ̀lú ẹyìn fún Olúwa rẹ.¹ Kí o sì wà nínú àwọn olùforíkanlẹ̀ (fún Un).
arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
footnotes: 1. Ìyẹn ni pé, ṣe àfọ̀mọ́ Allāhu kúrò níbi gbogbo àdínkù àti àbùkù, kí o sì yìn Ín lógo pé, O pé tán pátápátá.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wakun mina al-sājidīna
